input.sentences: our vacation was amazing ! the resort was very nice and clean .
there were many trees and it was very green .
the beaches were not too crowded and the ocean was blue .
we walked barefoot on the beach for hours .
we just could n't get enough of the scenery and walked for most of the vacation .
output.sentences: On vacation, I stayed at a resort that was very nice.
There was not many trees, so not much green.
But there was the ocean, and it was not crowded, and the water was so blue.
I walked for hours along the beach.
I rarely walked except on vacation but who could stand to miss the perfect scenery.
